mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.username, su.avatar, su.nickname, bf.status FROM sa_user su LEFT JOIN b_friends bf ON (bf.user_id = su.id OR bf.friend_id = su.id) AND bf.status <> 'accepted' WHERE su.id <> #{loginId}

SELECT bf.id, bf.user_id, bf.friend_id, bf.status, bf.apply_text, bf.create_time, su.nickname, su.avatar FROM b_friends bf LEFT JOIN sa_user su ON bf.user_id = su.id WHERE bf.friend_id = #{loginId} AND bf.status = 'pending'
